overview: Michael Krebs comes to Diamond.com with 29 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Diamond.com, Michael spent 5 1/2 years as the CFO of a leading manufacturer of optical fiber components and modules, as well as its President & CEO in its last year of operations, prior to its sale in the spring of 2006. Before that, Michael spent 8 1/2 years at Bell Mobility as its VP & Treasurer, after having occupied senior budgetary, regulatory, tax planning, financing and treasury positions at Bell Canada.
